histoire-content: FireAqua is a site created by KevFR. It succeeds FireWave, which is a site designed to look like an operating system. The Aqua Project, started on November 3rd, 2021,  and changed it's name to FireAqua around Christmas. The site was redone in January 2022 and the former FireWave developers came to help development of the site. In February 2022, the site was translated into English by Zai, so the site can be understood by an English audience. FireAqua was released on June 24th, 2022, after 7 months of development.
objectif-title: What is the objective of FireAqua?
objectif-content: The main objective of FireAqua is to expand my community, without staying on a restricted platform (YouTube). You can read the latest news, and download my packs, so you can install older versions of Windows. The site benefits from an English translation so both the English and French speaking audience of my channel and understand the same site.
kevfr: Founder of FireAqua, and former founder of FireWave
password: For security reasons, I've decided to put a password. The password is kevfriscool
torrent: Files larger than 100MB are in .torrent. Thank you for your understanding.
youtube-title: My projects on YouTube this year!
youtube-desc: Here are my future goals on YouTube for 2022. It summarizes the video "My future projects for 2022"
youtube-content-1:
New year, new resolution! This year, I sent my cards, and as you can see, I've created a website, which you know as FireAqua. It is also time to announce my other projects. To start, I have to pass my college exams (which validates our skills when college is over). Moreover, I have to write an internship report which will waste my time. I have to make sure to have a good grade, and have consistent uploads on YouTube in order to stay active.
To start, outside of school, I will imporve my setup and buy myself new appliances for my videos.
youtube-content-2: After that, I will try to reach 500 subscribers. For this year I want to go for 1000 subscribers, which seems like an impossible challenge at the moment. I will try to make more videos in English. I'm also going to start two new projects. The first is related to computers, and the second is related to the Python programming language. I can only tell you what these are once FireAqua opens.
youtube-content-3: For 2022, I will move forward on YouTube, and I will improve the quality of my setup. Even with an exam, as hellish as getting a BSOD in Progressbar95 is, I'll prepare to have 1,000 subscribers. Videos in English, a new site, and interesting projects. This year, I will give everything!
youtube-list-1:
• An RGB keyboard
  • A new microphone for future videos
youtube-list-2:
• A new microphone and keyboard to improve the quality of my setup
  • Pass my exams and get a certificate
  • Pass 500 subscribers and go for 1000
  • Two new very interesting projects
  • More videos in English
torrent-why:
Files larger than 100MB are in .torrent for 2 reasons.
The first reason is that our site is hosted on GitHub Pages, and they don't allow large file sizes.
I recommend using qBitTorrent. Some torrent clients, like µTorrent are filled with ads and some can even be filled with viruses.
The second reason is to reduce storage space. I don't want a folder that's several GB large.
introduction: Hello, and welcome to FireAqua! I'm KevFR, the creator of the site. I make videos on computing and tutorials on installation of old Windows versions! You can find "Packs". They can contain ISOs, or themes based around Progressbar95! Packs are free and available to everyone! Don't hesitate to visit other pages, the site benefits from an English translation! So, what are you waiting for?
firewave-end-desc: This article is a reminder of the upcoming end of FireWave
rasp-title: Is it worth buying a Raspberry Pi in 2022?
rasp-desc: Le Raspberry Pi est un micro-ordinateur petit et pas cher, est-ce une bonne idée d'en acheter un ?
fermeture-desc: After more than 11 months of uptime, FireWave will shut down on Thursday, June 23, 2022. The GitHub will be deleted after the closure. Thanks to the developers who have participated in the development of FireWave
firewave-end-list:
• December 2021: Announcement of FireAqua
  • Mid-December 2021: Announcement of the closure of FireWave
  • January 2022: FireWave is archived
  • Mid-February 2022: FireWave shutdown reminder
  • Mid-June 2022: Shutdown of FireAqua & opening of FireAqua
  • August 2022: Release of FireWave archive
vista-title: Is still possible to use Windows Vista in 2022 ?
rpi-title: Faut-il acheter un Raspberry Pi en 2022 ?
intro-rpi: Le Raspberry Pi est un nano-ordinateur crée par la Fondation Raspberry Pi. Il utilise l'architecture ARM et tourne sous Linux. En plus de coutez pas cher, il est transportable partout et permet de faire de l'émulation ! Aujourd'hui je vais vous convaincre d'acheter un RPi, en 2022 !
rpi-title-3: Ce qu'il faut pour un Rapsberry Pi
rpi-title-4: Ce que vous pouvez faire avec
intro-discord: Après presque plus de 2 ans d'activité, le serveur discord officiel fermera ses portes le 31 mars 2022.
why-discord: Cela fait depuis le 8 novembre 2020, que mon serveur discord est en marche. Au fil du temps il a évolué, et puis petit à petit le serveur discord à commencer à stagnez. Les raisons de cette stagnation sont un manque d'activité, et le manque de membres. Plus récemment le serveur discord a subi un mass ping générale. Et aujourd'hui une baisse des membres.
new-discord: Il n'y aura pas de troisième serveur discord. En effet, la création d'un serveur discord requis beaucoup d'organisation et de temps pour au final avoir peu de monde. Nous tenons sincèrement à nous excusez pour cette fermeture, mais comprenez bien que ce serveur discord était « vide ».
thanks-discord: Merci d'avoir partagée de bon moment ensemble sur = KevFR Server's [FR]=.
